remarks: Strong property deduction for the group subtraction operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2015.)
statement:
grpsubpropd2.1 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` G ) ) $.
grpsubpropd2.2 $e |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` H ) ) $.
grpsubpropd2.3 $e |- ( ph -> G e. Grp ) $.
grpsubpropd2.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` G ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` H ) y ) ) $.
grpsubpropd2 $p |- ( ph -> ( -g ` G ) = ( -g ` H ) ) $.
$d B x y $.
$d G x y $.
$d H x y $.
$d ph x y $.
